tour.sidebar.userDropdownMenu.content:
This menu provides quick access to your account options:

• View Profile: Access and edit your profile information and account settings
• Organizations: Manage and switch between different organizations you have access to
• Logout: Securely log out of your account

You can also access additional menu items and account preferences from this dropdown.
